text: Kopaniec is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Stara Kamienica, within Jelenia Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south of Stara Kamienica, west of Jelenia Góra, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. Kopaniec is situated in the foothills of the Jizera Mountains (Góry Izerskie) near the Karkonosze. The village is well known because the artist colony (see www.kopaniec.pl). There are many agro-tourist facilities. ==References== Kopaniec
title: Kopaniec, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
